ing: 1 small head cauliflower, cored and cut into florets
1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into halves
1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, for garnish (optional)
des: "A few minutes prep in the morning and you can come home to a prepared meal. Serve with rice to fill out the meal. Serve with yogurt and lemon wedges."
ins:
Stir tomatoes, tomato paste, ginger, curry powder, kosher salt, and black pepper together in a slow cooker crock until smooth; add cauliflower, chicken, onion, and raisins and stir.
Cook on Low until the chicken is cooked through, 6 to 7 hours (or on High for 4 to 5 hours). Garnish with cilantro.
